events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Cardiff City

headlines.description: Cardiff City's Sol Bamba netted a dramatic late goal after a goalmouth scramble as they snatched a 2-1 win over 10-man Brighton & Hove Albion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bamba gives Cardiff win over 10-man Brighton

events.name: West Ham United at Huddersfield Town

headlines.description: Huddersfield Town missed a chance to climb out of the Premier League relegation zone when they were held to a 1-1 home draw by West Ham United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Huddersfield and West Ham battle to lively draw

headlines.description: Leicester City shared a 0-0 draw with Burnley at the King Power stadium on Saturday when football again took a back seat.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester, Burnley draw on emotional day

headlines.description: Salomon Rondon netted an impressive brace for Newcastle United as they claimed consecutive Premier League wins for the first time since April.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rondon double earns Newcastle second straight win

headlines.description: A late strike from Jose Holebas earned Watford a 1-1 draw at a rain-soaked Southampton and extended the home side's winless run to eight matches.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watford's Holebas strikes late to deny Soton victory

headlines.description: Juan Foyth's goal in the 66th minute gave Tottenham Hotspur a 1-0 win over Crystal Palace in Premier League action on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Foyth's header gives Tottenham win over Palace
